articles.title: Bitcoin: A Hedge for Trump’s China Trade War?
articles.description: The price of "digital gold" cryptocurrency Bitcoin thrives in a world wracked with uncertainty over President Trump's trade war with China.
articles.content:
Global uncertainty is good for Bitcoin investors, it seems.
